name: nativescript-iqkeyboardmanager
description: NativeScript wrapper of the popular IQKeyboardManager iOS library

scripts.demo.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios --emulator --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.setup: npm run build && cd ../demo && npm i
scripts.setupandinstall: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../src
scripts.ci.tslint: npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo
scripts.development.setup: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-iqkeyboardmanager && cd ../src

author: TJ VanToll <tj.vantoll@gmail.com> (http://tjvantoll.com/)
